title: Newly Renovated 1bd/1ba Top Floor in Charming Building -  8/1 (flex)
posting_body: Newly renovated top floor apartment at The Sherwin at Jarvis Square -- a charming vintage building with history.
This is a relet (12 month lease) for the entire unit owned by Becovic Management.
Available on 8/1 or after.
Apartment Highlights:
- Brand new renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom with ample closet space (3 closets - 1 walk in!)
- Heat/Water/Gas Included with RENT
- Granite Countertops w/undermount sink and amble white kitchen cabinetry
- New Stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and customizable touchscreen refrigerator
- Eat in kitchen counter - easily fits 2 barstools with underneath storage
- New designer plank flooring throughout the unit
- Ceiling fans in living room/dining area and bedroom
- Renovated bathroom with subway tiling, mirrored vanity and convenient sink storage space
- Saflok Security Key Entry and security cameras throughout property
- Dogs and Cats Allowed (No pent rent, there is a one-time pet)
Building Details:
- 24 HR Fitness Room
- 24 HR Laundry Room with Mobile Pay
- 2 small vintage elevators (comfortably fits a queen size bed and 3 seater sofa)
- BBQ Stone Patio Seating with Grill
- Dog Walk Zone
- Bike Parking
- Butterfly MX Video Front Door Intercom
- Key Fob Security Access
What's nearby?
Nice quiet tree-lined neighborhood.
Close to Jewel (5 minute walk), local coffee shop, Restaurants, Park (1 block west)
Nightlife & Beach (2 blocks east), Loyola and Northwestern Universities.
Several stores within driving distance as well - Trader Joes/Wholefoods/Target (7 min drive), and Lincolnwood Mall, Marianos, Walmart, Lowes, etc.. (10 minutes)
Transportation?
Near the Jarvis Red Line stop and buses, off street parking.
What's not Included?
Cable/Internet, no central air but can sell window ac unit if needed.
